title: Generic Object
description: Prototype of an abstracted object that has one or more characteristics.

allOf.description: A unique identifier for the object type.

characteristics.defintions: A list of characteristics to apply to this object.

scale.description: Inverse scaling factor to transform an extent coordinates to normalized x-y grid. That is, a scaling factor of 2 changes a point at (0.5, 0.5) to (0.25, 0.25).

position.description: Normalized x-y coordinates providing an offset for the characteristics in the scene.
